channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Falconeer
channel.description:
**The Falconeer** Blue Dragon Investigative
>Passives: None
>Day Ability: Caged Bird - Watch a player and see if they left their room that night. Infinite uses. Does not presist between nights. _Note: all actions that require this ability will be referred to as "watched player"_
>Night Ability 1: Train - Determine the Ability type* of the watched player's action that night.
*see below for types of ability types
>Night Ability 2: Freed Bird - Determine the faction of the watched player. 2 Uses.
Converts to: **The Birdwatcher** Unseen Investigative
>Passives: None
>Day ability: Caged Eagle - Watch a player that is not an unseen member. If they visit, you will be alerted to who they visited.
>Night ability 1: Discipline - Determine the ability type of the watched player's action that night. All Investigatives will be prevented from visiting the watched player. Infinite Uses.
>Night ability 2: Enraged Bird - Prevent healers targeting the watched player. 2 uses.
------------ **Ability Types:**
Investigative Abilities (Foresight, Flirt, Surveille) Protective Abilities (Crimson Potion, Drug, Defend) Killing Abilities (Bear companion, 2 for 1, Execute) Chaos Abilities (Tornado, Serve Wine, Debautch) Special Abilities (Other) Ability Not used (Applies to people who didn't use an ability that night.)
**Lore:** The pride and joy of the kingdom was the festivals. Everyone showed off their talents, including the falconeer. His birds were trained to be expert delivery birds. So why would the unseen target this teenager? The answer was simple. Sending Messages. His bird picked up a letter the day after the fesivals were over. It read,
_Dear Robert,_ _We have noticed your extraordinary talents as a bird trainer. I am willing to have you as a part of our business to be a delivery boy. It may not sound like much, but it is vital to our team, and you will get good pay for your time. Consider wisely your oppertunity,_
_The MM_
**Notes:** This class is used mostly to eliminate who a person could not be. Paired up with another investigative is where this class really shines, as you can't get much info on your own.
EDIT1: Buffed day ability of birdwatcher, will now be notified of visit and who they visited EDIT2: Adjusted the ability categories
